dialogue.speaker: kirin, the second shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: taj dropped the switch behind some rocks???

dialogue.speaker: kirin, the second shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: oh man sim is totally going to kill him for that. she told him to be careful

dialogue.speaker: kirin, the second shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: well, you can dig him out of his early grave if you want

dialogue.speaker: kirin, the second shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: that bow over there should let you hit the switch if you've got the aim right

dialogue.speaker: kirin, the second shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: go ahead and try it out on the gate up ahead

dialogue.speaker: kirin, the second shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: * man... sim is really scary when she's mad... *
